Lootbox-based cash cow economy, no thanks. The gameplay was not for me, as it's clearly built around the concept of competition. Everything about the game screams "take me seriously", which I just don't like. For me, at the end of the day, video games are just games. I could play the more casual modes, but then why not just play a different shooter?
